eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.bavenir.vicinity.gatewayapi.App

  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the Gateway API program. Loads configuration, initializes logger and runs the threads. It also waits for signal from the OS to run its shutdown hook and perform a cleanup.
    Author:
    sulfo

        private static final java.lang.Boolean CONFIG_DEF_LOGGINGCONSOLEOUTPUT

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private static boolean initialize()
        Initialization method called during application startup. Loads program configuration and sets logging facilities.
        Returns:
        True if initialization is successful. False otherwise.

      • translateLoggingLevel

        private static java.util.logging.Level translateLoggingLevel(java.lang.String stringValue)
        Translates the string value of logging level configuration parameter to Level object, that can be fed to Logger. If the stringValue is null, it will return the default logging level set by CONFIG_DEF_LOGGINGLEVEL constant. If the string contains other unexpected value (worst case) returns INFO.
        Parameters:
        stringValue - String value of the configuration parameter.
        Returns:
        String translated into Level object.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method of the Vicinity Gateway application. In starts the thread and registers a shutdown hook that waits for OS signal to terminate.
        Parameters:
        args -
